name: gtrade-points-subgraph
description: A subgraph that indexes gTrade point system based on on-chain events

scripts.deploy:hosted: npx graph deploy --product hosted-service --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --access-token ${GRAPH_ACCESS_TOKEN}
scripts.configure:arbitrum: pnpm clean && pnpm prepare:arbitrum && pnpm codegen
scripts.configure:polygon: pnpm clean && pnpm prepare:polygon && pnpm codegen
scripts.configure:mumbai: pnpm clean && pnpm prepare:mumbai && pnpm codegen
scripts.deploy:arbitrum: pnpm clean && pnpm configure:arbitrum && pnpm deploy:hosted gainsnetwork-org/gtrade-stats-arbitrum
scripts.deploy:polygon: pnpm clean && pnpm configure:polygon && pnpm deploy:hosted gainsnetwork-org/gtrade-stats-polygon
scripts.deploy:mumbai: pnpm clean && pnpm configure:mumbai && pnpm deploy:hosted gainsnetwork-org/gtrade-stats-mumbai
